Reconaissance patrols

Situation:
We need to ask the locals for hints on our targets. They may have knowledge about enemy movement.

Ask the chieftains in the villages. We need hints on enemy activity.

Public health, infrastructure and economy

Time: %2

Situation:
The conflict is aggravating the humanitarian situation in the province.

Task:
Ameliorate the living conditions by helping the locals. Protect vital infrastructure, so the situation does not get worse.

Time limit:
%1

Execute!

Lowering the tension

Time: %2

Situation:
The province must be made a safe place again.

Task:
Raise the general safety level of all villages by conducting patrols. Try to find intels about enemy activity.

Time limit:
%1

Execute!

Find and neutralize "Prophet"

Time: %2

Situation:
A man called "Prophet" seems to be educating men of Anizay in a salafistic manner.
His scholars are responsible for various terrorist attacks on civilian infrastructure, including the sabotage of oilpumps and pipelines. CIA therefor considers him a serious threat to the US interests and wants him to be killed.

Task:
Identify "Prophet" and put him to rest. This one is not going to be easy, because he is believed to be well supported by the locals.

Time limit:
%1

Execute!

Military uprising

Time: %2

Situation:
The Anizay armed forces do not accept the foreign presence. They work together with the milita.
They will try to maintain control of the area and probably launch attacks on our troops.

Task:
Defend the Anizay Province and yourself from the renegade military. Eliminate the commanding officers.

Time limit:
%1

Execute!

Clear skies

Situation:
The enemy has AA guns.

Task:
Destroy all static anti air.

Time limit:
%2

Cut their comms

Situation:
The enemy has set up mobile radio antennas.

Task:
Light them up.

Time limit:
%2

Neutralize officers

Situation:
The commanders of the enemy troops are not going to surrender.

Task:
Eliminate the commanding officers.

Time limit:
%2

Close quarters battle

Situation:
The enemy has taken advantage of civilian infrastructure.

Task:
Neutralize the enemy forces in the conquered village. Check the buildings to make sure there is none left.

Time limit:
%2

Store goods

Situation:
A C130 is going to land on the runway.

Task:
Retrieve the cargo load and transfer it to the unloading area.
If there is need to get rid of waste, just put it into the cargo space of that plane.

Time limit:
Until the next server restart
